column4: where can I grab a free windows live CD to update my laptop BIOS?
live cd windos @ microsoft

it's a laptop. there only a .exe package to update the BIOS
probably the .exe is a self-extracting iso for floppy ?
no floppy on this machine
i would not try using wine to update a bios
sure not. I remember a live windows but I can't remember the name. SAM part?
get support from manufacturor for update tru usb
old machine, it does not boot from usb
any luck flashing a notebook's BIOS running a single Linux OS?
what type notebook do you have, maybe the manufacturor has a solution
Sony and it's Japan. Zero tolerance for Linux here on the JP maker side
if the bios get corrupted, using wine, you will have no guarantee ,,, all you need is a dos prompt, right ?
sorry but kill me I will never run wine or any windoze stuff, I just want to boot with a live CD and update the BIOS in a way or another.
maybe this will do > http://www.bootdisk.com/usb.htm
checking now. thanks
else http://www.ultimatebootcd.com/  see section DOS Boot Disks
